attributes.action: Extend the provision of taxpayer funded free gymnasium membership to all taxpayers.
attributes.additional_details: I, and many of my friends and neighbours, would love go be able to afford gymnasium membership but it us simply beyond us.  But, at the same time our electeds are using some of the money taken from us in taxes to pay for THEIR exclusive membership and use of a gymnasium.  That facility needs to be extended to everybody so that they can get HMRC to pay their membership at a local facility so they can enjoy the same taxpayer funded gymnasium access as that taken by our elected dishonourables.
